name: ShipWrecked (randomerz)
description:
Stay alive as a perilous storm builds up and whirlpools toss your ship around! Collect fish to upgrade your engines and maintain control over the elements.

CONTROLS: WASD or Right-Click to move, Press E near a shop to open it, Collect as many fish as you can to win!

Credits:

Programming: Boomo,  Orange232; | Art (HUD): Ryubee__ | Audio (Main Theme): MadeInChina1211
